query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cost_alerts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  skuId INT,
  alertType ENUM('cost_increase', 'cost_decrease', 'margin_warning', 'budget_exceeded') NOT NULL,
  threshold DECIMAL(5,2),
  previousValue DECIMAL(12,4),
  currentValue DECIMAL(12,4),
  percentageChange DECIMAL(5,2),
  message TEXT,
  isRead BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  readAt BIGINT,
  readBy VARCHAR(100),
  createdAt BIGINT NOT NULL
);

  skuId INT,
  alertType ENUM('cost_increase', 'cost_decrease', 'margin_warning', 'budget_exceeded') NOT NULL,
  threshold DECIMAL(5,2),
  previousValue DECIMAL(12,4),
  currentValue DECIMAL(12,4),
  percentageChange DECIMAL(5,2),
  message TEXT,
  isRead BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  readAt BIGINT,
